Description:
Elections of the Faction Leader are held every 2 days. Every worthy player has the right register in the election of a new Leader.
To register in elections, the player must be a worthy member of the faction and have a sufficient indicator of efficiency.
Minimum efficiency: $minEfficiency
The efficiency of the character depends on the number of Confrontation points, which player earns on average in one day.
Your efficiency: $efficiency
